Name: Ignite
Desc:
Attacking enemies with Fire magic, except for Fire Aura, has a chance of creating a wall of fire at the hit location that Burns them
Ignite does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Can be toggled On/Off.

Desc.Old:
Grants a chance to summon a flame wall at targeted location upon striking enemies with fire-based attacks (except Fire Aura).
Ignite's flame wall effects are not affected by Damage Reflection statuses.
Can be toggled On/Off.
